src:
【金主與愛的距離】愛上霸氣總裁好浪漫　腦出血女歌手慘遭老公連環偷吃
05 Nov 2019, 08:58 by 娛樂組
美麗妄娜愛上經紀公司老闆烏鴉，在演藝圈相當常見，除了工作相處容易日久生情之外，和老闆的戀情往往也是魚幫水、水幫魚，互相照顧、互相加持彼此的事業。



黃立成除了擁有17直播外，旗下也做了藝人經紀，他與自家女團IVI成員紫薇曾被直擊，低調約會看電影，結束後一前一後離開，在黃立成家會合，兩人還有一隻愛犬Hachi。


黃立成曾被拍到和自家女團紫薇低調約會，還共養愛犬。（翻攝黃立成臉書）

日本王牌製作人小室哲哉曾與旗下歌手華原朋美、KEIKO傳緋聞，後來在2002年與KEIKO結婚，他去年傳出偷吃護理師，開記者會道歉並宣布引退，將全力照顧腦出血休養的KEIKO。但之後卻有他的前司機出面爆料，指小室哲哉從未盡過照顧妻子的義務，據日媒報導，他平均一個月才給妻子兩萬多台幣的生活費，目前雙方正協議離婚，但為贍養費問題始終談不攏。


方大同和王詩安外型登對又都有音樂素養，一直有緋聞。（翻攝方大同臉書）

方大同與旗下女弟子王詩安對音樂喜好相同，兩人都吃素，外型也很登對，被歌迷稱為「同詩CP」，但王詩安說兩人相識10年很信任對方，沒有戀愛火花。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 07:30
text:
[Golden and love distance] Fall in love with domineering president, good romance, cerebral hemorrhage, female singer, her husband stalked
05 Nov 2019, 08:58 by Entertainment Group
Beautiful Dina fell in love with the boss of the brokerage company. It is quite common in the entertainment industry. Besides the fact that it is easy to get along with the work, the relationship with the boss is often the same as the fish, the water, the mutual care and mutual support.



In addition to having 17 live broadcasts, Huang Licheng also acted as an artist broker. He and his own female group IVI member Ziwei were directly hit, low-key dating to watch movies, and left after the end, in Huang Licheng's family meeting, two people and one Only love dog Hachi.


Huang Licheng was photographed with a low-key date with her own female group Ziwei, and also raised a dog. (Flip photo of Huang Licheng Facebook)

Japanese ace producer Tetsuya Tetsuya and his singer Huayuan Pengmei and KEIKO passed the scandal, and later married KEIKO in 2002. He sent a stealing nurse last year, opened a press conference to apologize and announced his retirement, and will fully take care of cerebral hemorrhage. . However, after that, his former driver broke the news, saying that Komuro Tetsuya never fulfilled his obligation to take care of his wife. According to Japanese media reports, he only gave his wife more than 20,000 Taiwan dollars in living expenses in one month. At present, the two sides are negotiating a divorce, but The issue of alimony has never been discussed.


Fang Datong and Wang Shi'an have both musical literacy and have been rumored. (Flip the photo of Datong Facebook)

Fang Datong and his female disciple Wang Shi'an have the same music preferences. Both of them are vegetarian and their appearances are very good. They are called "same poetry CP" by the fans, but Wang Shi'an said that they have trusted each other for 10 years and have no love sparks.
Update time|2019.11.05 07:30
